website_summaries.verdict: While not the most durable pick on our list, the one-year warranty brings reassurance.
pros: Very light, effective graphite composite blank
5" long with low-profile aluminum oxide guides
Custom shimano reel seat and a cork handle for comfort
cons: Some units were broken upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Great rod at a great price
customer_reviews.text: First one worked so good, I had to buy I second one! Both the 7’ medium fast (two piece) and the 7’ fast heavy (one piece) preform flawlessly! Both are used for fresh water fishing, pike and bass. Solid construction and good feel, makes these rods a must for the price. I’ve had much more expensive ones that have not had this good a feel at the tip when fish bite softly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable rod for a two piece
customer_reviews.text: I needed a two piece rod because of space requirements in an airplane. This isn't a rod I'd use everyday but ok for a shorter non serious fishing trip. Not as sensitive as a high end one piece but very good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Fehlman

customer_reviews.title: Check the return options, check product specific on website first.
customer_reviews.text: Sjs56ul2b. This is a ultra light action: fast, for mono line 2-6lb, lure wt: 1/32-3/16oz and the length is 5/‘6”. This information Should be listed or easier to find to make correct selection easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading title not 2 piece buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I got the pole in 3 days... great! However unlike the title and name it is not two pieces. Very disappointed as I have had two others of this pole that were two piece. Still a good pole i guess disappointed in misleading title.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Daniels

customer_reviews.title: This is a well made rob for the price. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made rob for the price. You really can't beat it for the quality and brand. No need to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Keith T. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best trout rod I've ever owned. I've recommended it to everyone I know who fishes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This rod was just what I was looking for. I got the 7 ft. medium heavy. It's a versatile rod. It has plenty of backbone and nice tip also. I can flip jigs with accuracy and and bait fish as well. Its a well built rod. I like the handle shape and the guides are really nice. The price was nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this rod! Wonderful feel and play for trout fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Anne107

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Caught many large fish. Including 6 bull sharks with this one-piece 7' rod. Bought another one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod, but not 2 piece as listed
customer_reviews.text: The listing indicated it was a 2 piece rod, but when I got it, I discovered it was a one piece. The price is reasonable and it’s a good rod, so I can live with it, just a bit disappointed the description is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Doniell Westerman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice light rod and looking to have more enjoyment on the fall stocking
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Won’t even stay together. I must have revived a faulty rod.
customer_reviews.author: dustin baker

customer_reviews.title: shimano spinning rod
customer_reviews.text: fishing rod was to be 78 inches came in 75 inches tip broken off not even in box had to have been shipped broken
customer_reviews.author: Rita M.

customer_reviews.title: replace pole
customer_reviews.text: had to return pole was broke could replace pole thank you
customer_reviews.author: vanessa askew

customer_reviews.title: Shimano medium light rod
customer_reviews.text: Very good rod, looking to own the ultra light rod as well
customer_reviews.author: shan

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this rod like the plague!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rod to replace a Shimano Sojourn rod which had broken while fishing. This rod lasted about 2 weeks before it broke while I was fishing. Other reviewers had warned that these rods break quite easily. They were right! I would not purchase this rod again. In fact, I may never purchase another Shimano product again. Shame on you Shimano for making such poor products!!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Bob

customer_reviews.title: Glad it survived shipping
customer_reviews.text: Glad it survived shipping! The box was mangled in a way that makes you think that the fiberglass rod inside will be shattered. It wasn't. Great rod for the price. Excellent feel and balance. Looks nice also. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: JKByrnes

customer_reviews.title: Not expensive and not "high" end. But I do ...
customer_reviews.text: Not expensive and not "high" end. But I do fish them hard and when I'm done with them, I'm done. Currently own 4 in 3 different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Get used to the feel of the grip...
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Six reinforced eyes. Nice finish. Beautiful cork handle. But with both the Pflueger President 6940 and with the Shimano Sonora 4000FB reels, the forward reel seat nut makes your hand fall into grip in an awkward location. Kinda makes you feel like you need to grip it farther forward or back somehow. Simply a matter of personal taste, I know, but still worth mentioning. If you have used the forward reel seat nut style and love it, you will love this rod. But otherwise, stick with the traditional rear nut style or go for a "threadless" grip.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I like how lightweight it is
customer_reviews.text: I like how lightweight it is, I can hold it all day with out it wearing out my hands, but strong enough to handle most fish.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Shimano spin rod
customer_reviews.text: I have received this item in excellent condition and appropriate package.Looks great material,but I am still waiting To go fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Hsaavedra

customer_reviews.title: Favorite rod
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this rod for about 4 years and have caught several salmon with it I have been very happy with the performance of this rod I have the 7 foot spinning version . Its not stiff at all , when you catch a 4 lb salmon it feels allot bigger when your reeling it in .I think this is a great buy and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Zentime

customer_reviews.title: broke,too cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: i have broken one,so upset.i have other shimano rods.this is not shimano standard.junk.i was retrieving a lure and it snagged,just pulled it very gently and still broke!!
customer_reviews.author: jennie

product_meta.title: SHIMANO Sojourn 2-Piece Spin Rod
product_meta.description: The Shimano Sojourn is a custom looking rod with its newly designed Reel seat. The Rod Blank features Graphite composite which is light weight and super durable. We strapped on Cork Handles for a great feel and this series comes in the most popular actions. The Sojourn also features low profile aluminum oxide guides, EVA butt caps, a multipurpose hook keeper, and a one year limited warranty.
